This technique is a larger version of the [[Water Release: Exploding Water Colliding Wave]]. With it, the user spews out a massive amount of water, covering an entire area with a ferocious tsunami. The produced ocean of water can be used for further techniques, and even gathered into a gigantic [[Water Prison Technique|water prison]], allowing Kisame to use his [[Water Prison Shark Dance Technique]].

== Trivia ==
* In the anime TV broadcast, when Kisame used this technique against [[Killer B]], only the subsequent sphere of water is seen. In the DVD release, the crushing waves produced by this technique are shown.
